refnamediv.refpurpose: Removes the definition of an instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Removes the definition of an instrument as long as it is not in use.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: insnum -- number or name of the instrument to be deleted

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: As long as the indicated instrument is not active, remove deletes the instrument and memory associated with it. It should be treated with care as it is possible that in some cases its use may lead to a crash.
